thread.title: Wonderful hotel and great service
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel and great service - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: frichc
title: Wonderful hotel and great service
text:
my daughter and I stayed six nights in this wonderful hotel. it is clean, quiet and well located. Thank you IZABELLA from guest experience for doing everything to make our stay pleasant. The birthdays treats and daily fresh fruits were great and the access to club lounge made our stay even more enjoyable.
I highly recommend the Montcalm and look forward to our next visit.
